The OpenApiDocs Nuxt Module is designed to seamlessly integrate OpenAPI documentation into Nuxt.js applications, supporting both Nuxt 2.x and 3.x. It utilizes Vue.js components to render the OpenAPI specifications dynamically. This module is ideal for developers looking to embed API documentation directly into their Nuxt.js projects.
work with static and server target
The module is compatible with various Nuxt versions, supporting specific features based on the version.
: Works with both major versions of Nuxt.
: Automatically renders OpenAPI specifications using Vue.js components.
: Offers several options to customize the documentation setup.
: Integrates with the i18n plugin for multi-language support.
: Includes tools and setups for development and customization of the module.
Add the module to your project
Configure the module in your Nuxt configuration
Alternatively, specify a custom folder using the
Customize the module by modifying the
: Path to the folder containing OpenAPI specification files.
: Function returning an object mapping file names to display names.
: Enable debug mode to print information to the console.
: Toggle the display of document listings.

html .light .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-light);background: var(--shiki-light-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-light-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-light-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-light-text-decoration);}html.light .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-light);background: var(--shiki-light-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-light-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-light-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-light-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
